mapper.select: SELECT * FROM resource WHERE tenant_id = #{tenantId} AND status != 'DELETED' ORDER BY type, name
SELECT * FROM resource WHERE tenant_id = #{tenantId} AND type = #{type} AND status != 'DELETED' ORDER BY name
SELECT * FROM resource WHERE id = #{id} AND status != 'DELETED'

SELECT r.* FROM resource r JOIN service s ON s.tenant_id = r.tenant_id WHERE s.id = #{serviceId} AND r.tenant_id = #{tenantId} AND r.status = 'ACTIVE' AND ( (s.resource_type = 'STAFF' AND r.type = 'STAFF') OR (s.resource_type = 'ROOM' AND r.type = 'ROOM') OR (s.resource_type = 'BOTH' AND r.type IN ('STAFF', 'ROOM')) ) ORDER BY r.type, r.name
mapper.update: UPDATE resource SET name = #{name}, type = #{type}, description = #{description}, capacity = #{capacity}, location = #{location}, equipment = #{equipment}, specialties = #{specialties}, hourly_rate = #{hourlyRate}, status = #{status}, phone = #{phone}, email = #{email}, position = #{position}, start_date = #{startDate}, updated_at = #{updatedAt} WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE resource_availability SET day_of_week = #{dayOfWeek}, start_time = #{startTime}, end_time = #{endTime}, is_available = #{isAvailable}, updated_at = #{updatedAt} WHERE id = #{id}
